Lists.desc: New Added the app_context_stat category to matrix metrics
Lists.details:
• app_context_enabled Boolean

    • Default: false

    • When set to true, enables the full app_context_stat data collection feature

  • app_context_parser

    • Use one of: default, prefix, match

    • default: Default parser (extracts the first path segment)

    • prefix: Prefix-matching parser (most flexible)

    • match: Exact-matching parser (only matches fully identical paths)

  • app_context_parser_reset Number

    • Default: 0

    • A counter that forcibly resets the parserâ€™s internal cache and configuration

  • app_context_path_depth Number

    • Default: 1

    • Specifies the depth of path segments to extract from the URL (used only with the default parser)

  • app_context_path_set String

    • Defines a mapping of paths to monitor and their display names. Use a comma (,) to separate multiple entries

    • Example: name1@url1,name2@url2,url3,name4@url4

Lists.desc: New Added an option to display the original URL in step traces when URL normalization is applied
Lists.details:
• step_origin_url_enabled Boolean

    • Default: false
    • When URL normalization is applied, the original URL is also displayed in step traces.

Lists.desc: Fixed Fixed an issue where the original URL was not displayed in record summaries when URL normalization was applied
New Modified to automatically select a version based on the .NET runtime version of the installed server.
New Added the ISAPI filter-based transaction tracing feature.
New Supported transaction monitoring for WCF, ASP, CGI, ISAPI, and such by using the ISAPI filter.
Fixed Fixed the issue where X-Forwarded-For is not applied in WebForm.
Changed Improved backward compatibility with .NET framework 4.5 or earlier.
Changed Improved the method hook process.
New Supported LIthe NQ to SQL (System.Data.Linq) monitoring.
New Added the agent option to set the section name to exclude from monitoring.
New Added support of the MySQL driver to .NET Core.
Lists.details: It supports MySQL drivers through ADO.NET as well as direct MySQL data providers such as MySQL Connector/Net.

Lists.desc: Fixed Fixed the error where the client IP address appears as 0.0.0.0 in .NET Core.
